availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Simon J. Brummett (Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer and corp, sgt, lieut 7th KY Cav USA)

body.p: Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William C. Brummett and Rebecca Brummett. Farmer in Williamsburg, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as corporal, sergeant, first sergeant, second lieutenant, and first lieutenant from September 22, 1861, to September 24, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Williamsburg, p. 666.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0210.
Find A Grave, "Simon J. Brummett (1842-1906)," Memorial #82367925, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82367925 (accessed September 14, 2020).
